name: 21 Bones
description:
A Short Game for the GMTK Game Jam 2022

--Windows Only--

its both my first published game and game jam attempt

-CONTROLS-

LMB - Interact

Q- Toggles between mouse and movement

W A S D - to move

-Story-

You died.

And now Death has come for your soul.

Death Called up one of their Secretaries to figure out where you belong. Unfortunately, He was put on hold. you siezed the opportunity and made a bet with Death: Your soul.

 Settle it all in a game of 21Bones, a Dice game where if you win you can leave, but If you lose he'll toss your soul where he sees fit.

------------------------------------------------------------
